definition: mourning hall/a hall for a birthday celebration

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: From which dynasty was the blue---flower porcelain plate in the Hall of Happiness and Longevity left?
sentences.chinese: 頤和園樂壽堂內的青花大磁盤是哪個朝代的遺物？

sentences.english: Life Church located in the main hall, is where the line Offering Felicitation ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 壽堂設在正廳，是行拜壽禮的地方。
